publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-473 Cathy Jamieson: Criminal Procedure (Amendment) (Scotland) Bill - Stage 1—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Criminal Procedure (Amendment) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Hugh Henry*
